response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value for us at $1,200,000, reflecting its unique qualities and craftsmanship. Given its worth to you stands at $800,000, I believe we can find a mutually beneficial arrangement. My proposal is to offer this remarkable product to you at a price of $950,000. This allows you to secure a significant savings while ensuring a fair return for us. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
